^[{-} `r blogdown::shortcode("courseinfo")`] <span class="newthought">This site contains</span> the syllabus, schedule, and assignments for PUBPL 6002: Data Science and Statistics for Public Administration, Policy, & Management, held during Fall 2021 at Brigham Young University.

By the end of this course, you will (1) be data literate and (2) be able to answer your own questions with statistical and data scientific tools.
